metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1002201 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In haml versions prior to version 5.0.0.beta.2, when using user input toperform tasks on the server, characters like < > " ' must be escapedproperly. In this case, the ' character was missed. An attacker canmanipulate the input to introduce additional attributes, potentiallyexecuting code.

criterions.comment: ruby-haml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
